Headline: Eastbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express Temporary Reroute near Ogilvie Station
ShortDescription: Eastbound 120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Ogilvie Station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, Clinton, Washington, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Ogilvie Station.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: #112 Vincennes/111th buses are rerouted via 111th, Kedzie, 115th, Western and 111th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Kedzie, 115th, Western and 111th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: #52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie buses are rerouted in both directions via 115th, Springfield, 115th, Western and 111th near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Springfield, 115th, Western, 111th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses have been requested from Thorndale to Belmont in both directions. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
